definition: fat/fertile/loose-fitting or large/to fertilize/to become rich by illegal means/fertilizer/manure

sentences.english: Effect of long-term fallow and cultivation on soil fertility in rice-based cropping system .
sentences.chinese: 水旱轮作地区土壤长期休闲与耕种的肥力效应。

sentences.english: Alfisols are moderately leached forest soils that have relatively high native fertility.
sentences.chinese: 淋溶土系中等程度沥滤，本身肥力较高的森林土壤。

sentences.english: In addition, soil fertility was improved along with the increment of fertilization.
sentences.chinese: 施肥后效和土壤肥力均随施肥量的增加而提高。

sentences.english: Rubber trees intercropping with Alpinia villosum was the best to improve soil fertility.
sentences.chinese: 以橡胶间种砂仁对土壤肥力的提高最为理想。

sentences.english: Field trial was conducted to study balanced fertilization technology in banana on old orchard with higher fertility.
sentences.chinese: 在土壤肥力较高的老蕉园进行香蕉平衡施肥技术研究。

sentences.english: The experiment of the wheat special fertilizer is carried out on the different soils.
sentences.chinese: 对春小麦专用肥仔不同肥力的土壤上进行了实验研究。

sentences.english: The result shows that soil fertility of applying bio-bacterial fertilizer is higher than of others.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，施用生物菌肥的田块肥力远高于未施田。

sentences.english: Based on this conclusion, the paper deduced that it is possible to restore the nitrogen fertility under natural condition.
sentences.chinese: 据此结论，该区域可在自然条件下恢复土壤氮素肥力。

sentences.english: Density had more significant effects on wheat yield than soil fertility.
sentences.chinese: 密度对小麦产量的影响比土壤肥力更为显著。

sentences.english: Its accumulation depends on the acid value and fertility in it.
sentences.chinese: 它在土壤中能否积累取决于土壤肥力和土壤酸碱度。

sentences.english: The trees planted in both fertile and sterile soil had lower percentage infection.
sentences.chinese: 土壤肥力高或过低均不利菌根菌的侵染。

sentences.english: Finally, they can contribute to soil fertility and recycling of agricultural waste.
sentences.chinese: 最后，它们还有利于土壤肥力和农业废物的再利用。

sentences.english: The former fertile land was deserted by people because of the loss of fertility.
sentences.chinese: 原本肥沃的土地由于失去了肥力被人们荒弃了。

sentences.english: The overall fertility level in Mengding Mountain is not high.
sentences.chinese: 蒙顶山茶园土壤肥力质量总体水平不高。

sentences.english: After having occupied previously the high fertility soils, sugarcane is now moving toward low fertility soils.
sentences.chinese: 以前甘蔗占用高肥力土壤，现已转向低肥力土壤。

sentences.english: After having occupied previously the high fertility soils, sugarcane is now moving toward low fertility soils.
sentences.chinese: 以前甘蔗占用高肥力土壤，现已转向低肥力土壤。
